document_data.caption: A map showing Runer's Alley and surroundings in the Castle Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Runer's Alley
document_data.mainbody: '''Runer's Alley''' was a small backalley that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Runer's Alley was located in the southeast section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. It connected the southern ends of [[the Sutherlane]] and [[Haltovar Street]], passing through a small neighborhood just north of [[Julthoon Street]] near the border with the [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]].
document_data.History: The alley was named for a [[minstrel]] called [[Runer]] who slept here for many years.
